author: Play On Tabletop
description:
Follow on GameFound so when you pledge you get a free Kyra Rhust miniature https://gamefound.com/en/projects/mindwork-games/paradise---a-wastepunk-boardgame

Nick and Mubin have a blast with Paradise – A Wastepunk Boardgame, a fast-paced, skirmish-style board game set in a savage, post-apocalyptic world where strategy and firepower collide.
Designed to appeal to both board gamers and miniature wargamers, it blends tactical movement, dice-driven combat, and card-based surprises for a thrilling tabletop experience.

This is Mindwork Games’ first board game, and we are very excited to play it.
They are renowned in the miniature industry for our exceptional miniatures, and are now bringing high-end artwork to the board game industry. Play On bumped into them several times at different conventions and that helped lead to this moment where we get to play heir first game.

title: Paradise – A Wastepunk Boardgame played by Nick and Mubin!
